body: They're in front of linked guilds if they're just part of the hyperlink and don't join the guild?
body_html: They're in front of linked guilds if they're just part of the hyperlink and don't join the guild?

title: What's the point of the +s

body: Its like /r/ on reddit which shows its a guild, @ in front of text means username.
body_html: Its like /r/ on reddit which shows its a guild, @ in front of text means username.

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: The admins don't want this to be a reddit clone like all the other alternatives. I think that's why it's gaining more steam, it has appeal to more than just reddit refugees.
body_html: The admins don't want this to be a reddit clone like all the other alternatives. I think that's why it's gaining more steam, it has appeal to more than just reddit refugees.

author.bio: Let's be honest, we're probably all going to be convicted of wrongthink.
author.bio_html: Let's be honest, we're probably all going to be convicted of wrongthink.

body: Something I just learned, if you want to search for a Guild, you can add "+" in front in the search bar.  One warning tho, it is still a "dumb" search, at least for guilds.  For example, I was looking for a dashcams Guild, so I did "+Dashcams", it came back with nothing, but if you search "+dash", it will show up +Dashcam.
body_html: Something I just learned, if you want to search for a Guild, you can add "+" in front in the search bar. One warning tho, it is still a "dumb" search, at least for guilds. For example, I was looking for a dashcams Guild, so I did "+Dashcams", it came back with nothing, but if you search "+dash", it will show up +Dashcam.
